title: Problems loading the league of legends client
body:
For the first 10-15 times attempting to log into league of legends, I am faced with a box that says "trying to reconnect". This has occurred for the last month and is causing difficulties playing a game. My internet works perfectly. I am currently playing on a Mac book pro. Both myself and my housemate struggle to log in and he is currently using a lenovo laptop. I imagine that this is a problem with my internet settings however I cannot find information on how to solve the issue.

Any help would be appreciated!
I have followed the connection issues guide however this only applies to the laptop itself. I would appreciate help with how to correct the issue with the internet.

Thanks
Atium

replies.body: Your home network might be having issues and blocks if you're both having these issues.  There might be an issue with router settings or something else.  If the connection guide didn't help, see if auto-configuring firewall settings with [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) helps.  If not, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can check this out with you directly.
